articles.title: Nearly a month after Uvalde school massacre, mayor launches fierce criticism of state investigators
articles.description: On May 25, the day after the Uvalde school massacre, state and local leaders gathered at a news conference and voiced their support for the community, vowing to learn more about the circumstances that led to the killings of 19 children and two teachers.
